meanings: 난 그렇게 생각하지 않는다[그럴 리가 없다](강한 반대·부정을 나타냄)

meanings.meaning: Tel Hi Instructional Night For Kids

vlive.korean: 어때요? What do you think? 듣기 View video EMMA BEAUTY : [화보장인엠마] 시세이도 글로우 쿠션 & 톤업 쿠션으로 완성하는 맑고 투명한 광채 스킨

examples.korean: Do you think you’ll pledge this semester? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 너 이번 학기에 가입 서약을 할 것 같니? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Do you think you’ll pledge this semester? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They think they have the election sewn up. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 그 선거에서 다 이겼다고 생각하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They think they have the election sewn up. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It gave me goose pimples just to think about it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것을 생각만 해도 나는 소름이 돋았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It gave me goose pimples just to think about it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They think they have the US market stitched up. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 자기들이 미국 시장을 다 마련했다고 생각한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They think they have the US market stitched up. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I think we should wait until tempers have cooled. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리가 성질이 가라앉을 때까지 기다려야 할 것 같아. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I think we should wait until tempers have cooled. Add to Wordbook
